import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Col, Button, Row, Container, Card, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' const Register = () => { const [username,setUsername] = useState(''); const [password,setPassword] = useState(''); // Create the submit method. const submit = async e =>{ e.preventDefault() const user = { username:username, password:password }; // Create the POST requuest await fetch('http://localhost:8000/register/',{ method:'POST', headers:{'Content-Type':"application/json"}, body: JSON.stringify( { username, password } ) }); window.location.href='/login' } return (
